name: Gravity Runner (itch) (PoRoyal)
description:
Hello there! 

Gravity Runner is an infinite scroller game that I made years ago while I was learning Unity and C#. The main mechanic it's based on gravity control.

Dodge the laser beans and the spikes.

Controls:

- Spacebar -> Invert gravity

- D -> Dash

- P -> Pause

Credits:

- New art /Code Refactoring  -> Me

- Music  ->  

  • Menu:  eardeer
  • Game: sonically_sound
